1096090.name: Among Ripples: Shallow Waters
1096090.description:
Welcome to Among Ripples: Shallow Waters, an eco tycoon sim focused on
maintaining balance in lakes and rivers. The water bodies are filled with different
creatures that needs your help. In the game you focus on saving nature from
different hazards and problems. Our game is inspired by ecology and the people
who spend time and effort to solve the problems we face today.



Key Features



  • Create your own ecosystem
    Balance predators and prey, plants and other organisms. Watch how they
    interact with the world you create for them.

  • Nurture and tend to wildlife
    Understand their needs and comforts, giving them a place to call home.

  • Shape their world
    Raise and lower land with the terraforming tool, as well as expand bodies
    of water.

  • Immerse yourself
    A single-player campaign where you lead a team of experienced scientists,
    get to know your crew and dive further into dialogue between missions at
    the base camp. You can even see the world from the point of view of fish and
    other creatures.

  • Research new skills
    Build your mobile research base, research skill trees, and ask your companions
    for advice.

  • Build your own experience
    The open sandbox mode lets you have the freedom to build your own experience.
    A level editor and mod support enable you to branch out and find new unexpected
    ways to play the game.
